metadata.synopsis: This dialog plays if the player solves the Iron Throne before ever seeing the LOW_SteelWatchFoundry_DeadMansSwitchThreat dialog.After destroying the Iron Throne the player walks in Baneites tormenting Gondian Workers in the Foundry Work room.With the Iron Throne gone, the dead mans switch no longer works.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ause the debugbook>Set quest flags & options > Act3(LOW/END) > LOW - Steel Watch Foundry > choose any optiongo to -267; 6; -148

1.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
1.text: You have beaten and tormented us to the brink of insanity. You cut out my eyes. But we will bow no more.
1.context: NodeContext: this is his big revolution moment, he's furious and done bowing down

0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
0.text: Gondians! Rip the Motivator from this bastard's hands. FOR GOND!
0.context: NodeContext: this is his big revolution moment, he's furious and done bowing down. Roaring triumphantly
